languages.text: "А я — нет! Славная охота должна завершиться славным боем, и эти ксеносы мне по душе! Головой рогатого я украшу стойку над голо-камином, а тот, блестящий... да просто порублю его гадкую рожу!"

traits.locale_text: "А я — нет! Славная охота должна завершиться славным боем, и эти ксеносы мне по душе! Головой рогатого я украшу стойку над голо-камином, а тот, блестящий... да просто порублю его гадкую рожу!"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "And I do not! A glorious chase must end in a glorious battle, and I like these xenos! I will put the horned one's head above the holo-fireplace, and as for the shiny one... I will just chop his ugly mug into bits!"
languages.original_text: "А я — нет! Славная охота должна завершиться славным боем, и эти ксеносы мне по душе! Головой рогатого я украшу стойку над голо-камином, а тот, блестящий... да просто порублю его гадкую рожу!"

traits.locale_text: "And I do not! A glorious chase must end in a glorious battle, and I like these xenos! I will put horned one's head above the holo-fireplace, and as for the shiny one... I will just chop his ugly mug into bits!"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "And I do not! A glorious chase must end in a glorious battle, and I like these xenos! I will put horned one's head above the holo-fireplace, and as for the shiny one... I will just chop his ugly mug into bits!"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "And I do not! A glorious chase must end in a glorious battle, and I like these xenos! I will put the horned one's head above the holo-fireplace, and as for the shiny one... I will just chop his ugly mug into bits!"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "And I do not! A glorious chase must end in a glorious battle, and I like these xenos! I will put the horned one's head above the holo-fireplace, and as for the shiny one... I will just chop his ugly mug into bits!"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "And I do not! A glorious chase must end in a glorious battle, and I like these xenos! I will put the horned one's head above the holo-fireplace, and as for the shiny one... I will just chop his ugly mug into bits!"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "And I do not! A glorious chase must end in a glorious battle, and I like these xenos! I will put the horned one's head above the holo-fireplace, and as for the shiny one... I will just chop his ugly mug into bits!"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: «¡Y yo no! Una persecución gloriosa ha de acabar con una gloriosa batalla, ¡y me gustan estos xenos! Colgaré la cabeza del astado sobre mi holochimenea, y en cuanto a la de ese que brilla... ¡a ese le rajaré su feo rostro!».
languages.original_text: "And I do not! A glorious chase must end in a glorious battle, and I like these xenos! I will put the horned one's head above the holo-fireplace, and as for the shiny one... I will just chop his ugly mug into bits!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Y yo no! Una persecución gloriosa ha de acabar con una gloriosa batalla, ¡y me gustan estos xenos! Colgaré la cabeza del astado sobre mi holochimenea, y en cuanto a la de ese que brilla... ¡a ese le rajaré su feo rostro!».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: “可我不想！光荣的追逐，当然要以光荣的战斗结束，而且我很喜欢这些异形！我要把那只长角的头摆在全息壁炉上，至于那只会发光的……我要把他那张丑脸剁成碎片！”
languages.original_text: "And I do not! A glorious chase must end in a glorious battle, and I like these xenos! I will put the horned one's head above the holo-fireplace, and as for the shiny one... I will just chop his ugly mug into bits!"

traits.locale_text: “可我不想！光荣的追逐，当然要以光荣的战斗结束，而且我很喜欢这些异形！我要把那只长角的头摆在全息壁炉上，至于那只会发光的……我要把他那张丑脸剁成碎片！”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: « Pas moi ! Une traque glorieuse doit se terminer par un combat épique, et ces xénos me plaisent bien ! J'accrocherai la tête du cornu au-dessus de l'holo-cheminée, quant au rutilant... je vais simplement lui découper sa sale trombine en petits morceaux ! »
languages.original_text: "And I do not! A glorious chase must end in a glorious battle, and I like these xenos! I will put the horned one's head above the holo-fireplace, and as for the shiny one... I will just chop his ugly mug into bits!"

traits.locale_text: « Pas moi ! Une traque glorieuse doit se terminer par un combat épique, et ces xénos me plaisent bien ! J'accrocherai la tête du cornu au-dessus de l'holo-cheminée, quant au rutilant... je vais simplement lui découper sa sale trombine en petits morceaux ! »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: 「俺はそんなことはしない！栄光ある追跡は、名誉ある戦いで終わるのだ。そして俺はこの異種族が気に入った！角の生えたヤツはホロ暖炉の上に置いてやる。そして眩しいやつは…あいつの醜い顔を切り刻んでやる！」
languages.original_text: "And I do not! A glorious chase must end in a glorious battle, and I like these xenos! I will put the horned one's head above the holo-fireplace, and as for the shiny one... I will just chop his ugly mug into bits!"

traits.locale_text: 「俺はそんなことはしない！栄光ある追跡は、名誉ある戦いで終わるのだ。そして俺はこの異種族が気に入った！角の生えたヤツはホロ暖炉の上に置いてやる。そして眩しいやつは…あいつの醜い顔を切り刻んでやる！」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Und ich nicht! Eine glorreiche Jagd muss in einem glorreichen Kampf enden, und ich mag diese Xenos! Den Hörnerkopf hänge ich mir über den Holo-Kamin, und was den Schimmernden angeht ... Dessen hässliche Fratze zerstückele ich einfach!"
languages.original_text: "And I do not! A glorious chase must end in a glorious battle, and I like these xenos! I will put the horned one's head above the holo-fireplace, and as for the shiny one... I will just chop his ugly mug into bits!"

traits.locale_text: "Und ich nicht! Eine glorreiche Jagd muss in einem glorreichen Kampf enden, und ich mag diese Xenos! Den Hörnerkopf hänge ich mir über den Holo-Kamin, und was den Schimmernden angeht ... Dessen hässliche Fratze zerstückele ich einfach!"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Bense istemiyorum! Şanlı bir takibin sonu şanlı bir savaş olmalı. Ayrıca bu zenoları sevdim. Boynuzlu olanın kafasını holo şöminemin üstüne asacağım. Parlak olansa... Onun o çirkin suratını parçalarına ayıracağım!"
languages.original_text: "And I do not! A glorious chase must end in a glorious battle, and I like these xenos! I will put the horned one's head above the holo-fireplace, and as for the shiny one... I will just chop his ugly mug into bits!"

traits.locale_text: "Bense istemiyorum! Şanlı bir takibin sonu şanlı bir savaş olmalı. Ayrıca bu zenoları sevdim. Boynuzlu olanın kafasını holo şöminemin üstüne asacağım. Parlak olansa... Onun o çirkin suratını parçalarına ayırıp geçeceğim!"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale
